column3: Completed build up of NEW system sn 0031.  Tested all sensor inputs successfully.  RF modem tested okay.  Installed new Iridium SIM card. Successfully tested GPS and XMIT functions with roof-mounted antennas connected inside lab.
Ran Current drain test for 3 days, 14.46mA Average.  Dumped FLASH RAM data file, which looked okay.
Need to run GPS and XMIT test with system antennas (not roof antennas).
Deployed on RT-013, 12N-90E, mooring adrift with TFLEX0031, eventually landing in Myanmar, so it is presumed that TFLEX0031 is LOST.
